game.name: Oh Deer
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 한 명의 사냥꾼과 최대 네 명의 친구들, 모두 사슴으로 위장했습니다. 이 긴장감 넘치는 숨바꼭질 게임에서 모든 움직임이 마지막일 수 있습니다. 당신은 무리와 어울리시겠습니까, 아니면 눈에 띄시겠습니까? 오, 사슴...
game.shortDescriptionEn: One Hunter, and up to four more friends disguised as deer, in this thrilling game of hide-and-seek where every move could be the last. Will you blend in with the herd or stand out? Oh Deer...

reviewHighlights.text: This game is fun but very limited, in some ways that's its charm, but it can get stale rather fast. If it is on sale for 5 or less bucks its a great l...
